doc:
Billy Gray (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Gray_(actor) 0 William Thomas "Billy" Gray (born January 13, 1938) is an American former actor known primarily for his role as James "Bud" Anderson, Jr., in 193 episodes of the situation comedy Father Knows Best, which aired between 1954 and 1960 on both NBC and CBS. A motorcycle aficionado, Gray maintains a large collection of the vehicles. William_Thomas_"_Billy_"_Gray ( born January_13_,_1938 ) is an_American_former_actor known primarily for his_role as James_"_Bud_"_Anderson , Jr. , in 193_episodes of the_situation_comedy_Father Knows Best , which aired between 1954_and_1960 on both NBC_and_CBS . A_motorcycle_aficionado , Gray maintains a_large_collection of the_vehicles .
